languages.text: Руолдо когда-то был членом династии, правящей Идексом, но был отослан своей же семьей. Правительство относится к Руолдо настороженно — поговаривали, что он был замешан в неких ересях.
Ruoldo used to be a member of Idex's ruling dynasty, before being sent away by his own family. The government is wary of Ruoldo due to his rumoured involvement in heresies of some sort.
languages.original_text: Руолдо когда-то был членом династии, правящей Идексом, но был отослан своей же семьей. Правительство относится к Руолдо настороженно — поговаривали, что он был замешан в неких ересях.

traits.locale_text: Ruoldo used to be a member of Idex's ruling dynasty, before being sent away by his own family. The government is wary of Ruoldo due to his rumoured involvement in heresies of some sort.

Ruoldo used to be a member of Idex's ruling dynasty, before being sent away by his own family. The government is wary of Ruoldo due to his rumoured involvement in heresies of some sort.

languages.text: Ruoldo war Mitglied der Herrscherdynastie von Idex, wurde jedoch von seiner eigenen Familie fortgeschickt. Die Regierung ist Ruoldo gegenüber misstrauisch, weil er Gerüchten zufolge in Ketzereien verwickelt ist.
languages.original_text: Ruoldo used to be a member of Idex's ruling dynasty, before being sent away by his own family. The government is wary of Ruoldo due to his rumoured involvement in heresies of some sort.

traits.locale_text: Ruoldo war Mitglied der Herrscherdynastie von Idex, wurde jedoch von seiner eigenen Familie fortgeschickt. Die Regierung ist Ruoldo gegenüber misstrauisch, weil er Gerüchten zufolge in Ketzereien verwickelt ist.

languages.text: Ruoldo était membre de la dynastie dirigeante d'Idex, avant que sa famille ne l'exile. Le gouvernement se méfie de lui, car des rumeurs racontent qu'il aurait été impliqué dans des pratiques hérétiques.
languages.original_text: Ruoldo used to be a member of Idex's ruling dynasty, before being sent away by his own family. The government is wary of Ruoldo due to his rumoured involvement in heresies of some sort.

traits.locale_text: Ruoldo était membre de la dynastie dirigeante d'Idex, avant que sa famille ne l'exile. Le gouvernement se méfie de lui, car des rumeurs racontent qu'il aurait été impliqué dans des pratiques hérétiques.

languages.text: ルオルドはかつてイデックスの支配貴族の一員だったが、家族によって追放された。ルオルドが何らかの異端行為に関与しているという噂があるため、政府は彼に警戒心を抱いている。
languages.original_text: Ruoldo used to be a member of Idex's ruling dynasty, before being sent away by his own family. The government is wary of Ruoldo due to his rumoured involvement in heresies of some sort.

traits.locale_text: ルオルドはかつてイデックスの支配貴族の一員だったが、家族によって追放された。ルオルドが何らかの異端行為に関与しているという噂があるため、政府は彼に警戒心を抱いている。

languages.text: Ruoldo fue miembro de la dinastía gobernante de Idex antes de que su propia familia lo enviara lejos. El gobierno trata con recelo a Ruoldo por su presunta participación en posibles herejías.
languages.original_text: Ruoldo used to be a member of Idex's ruling dynasty, before being sent away by his own family. The government is wary of Ruoldo due to his rumoured involvement in heresies of some sort.

traits.locale_text: Ruoldo fue miembro de la dinastía gobernante de Idex antes de que su propia familia lo enviara lejos. El gobierno trata con recelo a Ruoldo por su presunta participación en posibles herejías.

languages.text: 罗尔多在被自己的家人送走之前，曾是艾德克斯统治家族的一员。艾德克斯政府对罗尔多持警惕态度，因为根据传闻，他曾参与过某种异端恶行。
languages.original_text: Ruoldo used to be a member of Idex's ruling dynasty, before being sent away by his own family. The government is wary of Ruoldo due to his rumoured involvement in heresies of some sort.

traits.locale_text: 罗尔多在被自己的家人送走之前，曾是艾德克斯统治家族的一员。艾德克斯政府对罗尔多持警惕态度，因为根据传闻，他曾参与过某种异端恶行。

languages.text: Ruoldo'nun, ailesiyle birlikte sürülmeden önce İdex'e hükmeden hanedanlığa mensup olduğunu öğreniyorsun. Hükûmet, Ruoldo'nun bir nevi kâfir olduğuna dair iddialardan dolayı bu isme temkinli yaklaşıyor.
languages.original_text: Ruoldo used to be a member of Idex's ruling dynasty, before being sent away by his own family. The government is wary of Ruoldo due to his rumoured involvement in heresies of some sort.

traits.locale_text: Ruoldo'nun, ailesiyle birlikte sürülmeden önce İdex hanedanlığına mensup olduğunu öğreniyorsun. Hükûmet, Ruoldo'nun bir nevi kâfir olduğuna dair iddialardan dolayı bu isme temkinli yaklaşıyor.
